html: ... Yep. Poor ol' Sarah. I still can't believe @telltalegames made such scenes that caught her off-guard, and worsened her pathophobia, and also scared the heck out of Sarah about her favorite character of all time, Petra. #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 #Season2
text: ... Yep. Poor ol' Sarah. I still can't believe @telltalegames made such scenes that caught her off-guard, and worsened her pathophobia, and also scared the heck out of Sarah about her favorite character of all time, Petra.  #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 #Season2

html: So, at that time of Episode 3 of #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 coming out, and played the episode, Sarah's pathophobia kept worsening, still extremely scared about Petra and what's going to happen to her and her Wither Sickness. pic.twitter.com/Od1IXn38Xj
text: So, at that time of Episode 3 of #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 coming out, and played the episode, Sarah's pathophobia kept worsening, still extremely scared about Petra and what's going to happen to her and her Wither Sickness. pic.twitter.com/Od1IXn38Xj

html: I'm right now making another shorts with a mix-up between #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 and #DisneyFrozen. This time, it's going to refer to what Sarah's reaction was when Petra coughed the second time when her Wither Sickness worsened.
text: I'm right now making another shorts with a mix-up between #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 and #DisneyFrozen. This time, it's going to refer to what Sarah's reaction was when Petra coughed the second time when her Wither Sickness worsened.

html: Sarah's actual reaction when Petra started coughing while suffering from her Wither Sickness. Sarah was acting exactly like Elsa from #DisneyFrozen because she suffers from pathophobia (fear of disease and sickness). #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 #Season2pic.twitter.com/QiTNCfV01P
text: Sarah's actual reaction when Petra started coughing while suffering from her Wither Sickness. Sarah was acting exactly like Elsa from #DisneyFrozen because she suffers from pathophobia (fear of disease and sickness).  #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 #Season2pic.twitter.com/QiTNCfV01P

html: The quote above was originally sung by Queen Elsa from #DisneyFrozen, but I thought that Petra singing it matches it perfectly because she had to keep her Wither Sickness hidden from her friends until she revealed it to Jesse. #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 #Season2
text: The quote above was originally sung by Queen Elsa from #DisneyFrozen, but I thought that Petra singing it matches it perfectly because she had to keep her Wither Sickness hidden from her friends until she revealed it to Jesse.  #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 #Season2

html: Petra: "Don't let them in, Don't let them see, Be the good girl you always have to be, Conceal, don't feel, don't let it show, Make one wrong move, And everyone will know." #MinecraftStoryMode #Season1 #Season2pic.twitter.com/HqZmU5kSzM
